trans-unit.source: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides the JSON format that is supported by the July 2015 Release of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="945fd023-d324-4d3a-b709-4e8a7b5c4828" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Activity</link> for the old JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using an older version, see <link xlink:href="945fd023-d324-4d3a-b709-4e8a7b5c4828" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Activity</link> for the old JSON format.

trans-unit.source: The Copy Activity copies the data from a data store to another data store.
trans-unit.target: The Copy Activity copies the data from a data store to another data store.

trans-unit.source: The store can be either a cloud or on-premises store.
trans-unit.target: The store can be either a cloud or on-premises store.

trans-unit.source: It consumes one input and produces one output.
trans-unit.target: It consumes one input and produces one output.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity should set to <embeddedLabel>Copy</embeddedLabel> in the pipeline JSON definition.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity should set to <embeddedLabel>Copy</embeddedLabel> in the pipeline JSON definition.

trans-unit.source: Read through <link xlink:href="c90a5779-eefe-473a-acfa-40934b50d0cc" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Pipelines and Activities</link> for overall pipeline definition and activity definition within first before reading this topic.
trans-unit.target: Read through <link xlink:href="c90a5779-eefe-473a-acfa-40934b50d0cc" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Pipelines and Activities</link> for overall pipeline definition and activity definition within first before reading this topic.

trans-unit.source: This topic provides details about elements used in the <embeddedLabel>typeProperties</embeddedLabel> section of the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides details about elements used in the <embeddedLabel>typeProperties</embeddedLabel> section of the activity definition.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>Copy</embeddedLabel> activity, the <embeddedLabel>typeProperties</embeddedLabel> section in the JSON definition contains <embeddedLabel>source</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>sink</embeddedLabel> sections.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>Copy</embeddedLabel> activity, the <embeddedLabel>typeProperties</embeddedLabel> section in the JSON definition contains <embeddedLabel>source</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>sink</embeddedLabel> sections.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, source type is set to <embeddedLabel>SqlSource</embeddedLabel> and sink type is set to <embeddedLabel>BlobSink</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the following example, source type is set to <embeddedLabel>SqlSource</embeddedLabel> and sink type is set to <embeddedLabel>BlobSink</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: See the following topics for more information:
trans-unit.target: See the following topics for more information:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="352a8dcf-36c3-4ee8-9d85-399a96e2e955" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported Sources and Sinks</link> topic for all sources and sinks supported by the Copy Activity and properties of those sources sinks.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="352a8dcf-36c3-4ee8-9d85-399a96e2e955" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported Sources and Sinks</link> topic for all sources and sinks supported by the Copy Activity and properties of those sources sinks.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="f1ae4f5b-8555-4472-9136-7b65625941bf" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Examples (Copy Activity)</link> topic for examples of using the Copy Activity.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="f1ae4f5b-8555-4472-9136-7b65625941bf" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Examples (Copy Activity)</link> topic for examples of using the Copy Activity.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Copy data with Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=517553</linkUri></externalLink> for conceptual information as well as well as links to walkthroughs.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Copy data with Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=517553</linkUri></externalLink> for conceptual information as well as well as links to walkthroughs.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Get started with Azure Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516910</linkUri></externalLink> for an end-to-end tutorial that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory with a pipeline that copies data from a Azure Blob storage to an Azure SQL database.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Get started with Azure Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516910</linkUri></externalLink> for an end-to-end tutorial that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory with a pipeline that copies data from a Azure Blob storage to an Azure SQL database.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Enable pipelines to work with on-premises data</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516966</linkUri></externalLink> for a walkthrough that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory to copy data from an on-premises SQL Server database to an Azure blob.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Enable pipelines to work with on-premises data</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516966</linkUri></externalLink> for a walkthrough that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory to copy data from an on-premises SQL Server database to an Azure blob.
